function evaluateProperty({api, helpers}) {

}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-10-09 09:33:06</sys_created_on><sys_id>b43a781907f13110151cfc018c1ed000</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>image_1/src</sys_name><sys_package display_value="HROB-POC" source="x_1106637_hrob_poc">b73392a507203110151cfc018c1ed083</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="HROB-POC">b73392a507203110151cfc018c1ed083</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_b43a781907f13110151cfc018c1ed000</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-10-09 09:35:44</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
